scripts.backup:local:dev: cross-env FIREBASE_ENV=dev STORAGE_TYPE=local node src/cli.js backup
scripts.backup:firebase:dev: cross-env FIREBASE_ENV=dev STORAGE_TYPE=firebase node src/cli.js backup
scripts.backup:local:emulator: cross-env FIREBASE_ENV=dev STORAGE_TYPE=local node src/cli.js --env emulator backup
scripts.backup:firebase:emulator: cross-env FIREBASE_ENV=dev STORAGE_TYPE=firebase node src/cli.js --env emulator backup
